translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界中……暇になるだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The whole world... will become bored, right?
......Will it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、なるさ。JAPANは特にな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it will. Especially JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少はごたつくかもだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There might be some commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利が満足する戦場はほとんど無くなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but there will be almost no battlefields that Mouri would be satisfied with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが嫌ってー訳でもねぇけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like I hate that though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる事がねぇのは退屈だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having nothing to do is boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから冒険か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that's why adventure, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそ。世の中、広いからなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exactly. The world is a wide place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このメモ帳は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This notebook,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その目印にするための宝の地図って訳だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is like a treasure map to serve as a landmark for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なかなか面白そうではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sounds pretty interesting, doesn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……っと、その前に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah... but before that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やらなきゃいけねぇ事があるけどな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's something I have to do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今の戦争以外にか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides the current war?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……あいつに、何か仕込まねーと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah... I have to teach that guy something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰だあいつって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who do you mean by 'that guy'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたの子」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐお！　てるさんのか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gah! Teru-san's?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶん、みんなよってたかって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably, everyone will gather around and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利流を仕込むだろーから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: teach him the Mouri way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしくらいは、お袋がやったみたいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least someone like me, just like mother did,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつだけ……マトモなモン仕込もうかってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thought I'd teach him just one decent thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、てるさんやちぬちゃんにも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Teru-san and Chinu-chan too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お袋さんが何か仕込んだんだったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mother taught them something, didn't she?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まー、娘と決まったわけじゃーないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it's not decided that it's a daughter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お袋の考えが二代目で消えて無くなるのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but for mother's ideas to disappear with the second generation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとアレだしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that would be a bit of a shame.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも、赤ん坊のうちは食いモンに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, for infants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気ィつけなきゃなんねーしな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have to be careful about food...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平気で蜂蜜酒とか飲ませそうだし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They might just give them honey wine without a care...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいたい、戦場にぶち込むのは良いとして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Putting them on the battlefield is one thing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の世話、誰がやるんだ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but who will take care of everything else...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉貴、やれんのかよ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big sis, can you do it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………やたら気になってきた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I'm getting really worried...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたし、旅に出れっかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can I even go on a journey...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか、てるさんよりきくちゃんの方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Somehow, Kiku-chan seems more like the mother than Teru-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親みたいだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a mom...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バッ、やめやがれ、そーいうの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-You better stop saying things like that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……ふふんがふん……とくらぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haa... fufun ga fun... take this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大陸に来たってぇのに温泉とは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To come all the way to the continent and still find a hot spring...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、あったまるねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, this really warms me up...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくは日頃の疲労を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku was washing away her daily fatigue

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の温泉で流していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the hot spring of Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこに俺様どーーーーーーん！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And here I am—Ta-da!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶわあああぁぁぁッ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bwaaaah!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、きくちゃん発見。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, I found you, Kiku-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず良い身体をしているではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're still in such a great shape as always.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふふふ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gufufufu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てっ、てめぇっ、何を平然と女湯に……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-You damn it, what are you calmly doing in the women's bath...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （…………いや待て。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Wait a minute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもいつもこのパターンで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every single time with this pattern,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うろたえちまってるじゃねーか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I always get flustered, don't I?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この野郎にはそこをつけ込まれて何度も何度も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This bastard takes advantage of that again and again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたしも毛利の女！　同じ轍は踏まねぇ！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm also a Mouri woman! I won't make the same mistake!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく……年中発情中かよ、テメェ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seriously... are you horny all year round, you bastard?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくは背筋を伸ばし、平然とランスに向き直った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku straightened her back and calmly turned to face Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっち入って来ていい男はガキだけだぜ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only guys allowed to come in here are kids, you know?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The whole world... will become bored, right?
......Will it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、なるさ。JAPANは特にな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it will. Especially JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少はごたつくかもだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There might be some commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利が満足する戦場はほとんど無くなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but there will be almost no battlefields that Mouri would be satisfied with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが嫌ってー訳でもねぇけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like I hate that though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる事がねぇのは退屈だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having nothing to do is boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから冒険か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that's why adventure, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそ。世の中、広いからなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exactly. The world is a wide place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このメモ帳は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This notebook,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その目印にするための宝の地図って訳だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is like a treasure map to serve as a landmark for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なかなか面白そうではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sounds pretty interesting, doesn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……っと、その前に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah... but before that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やらなきゃいけねぇ事があるけどな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's something I have to do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今の戦争以外にか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides the current war?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……あいつに、何か仕込まねーと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah... I have to teach that guy something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰だあいつって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who do you mean by 'that guy'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたの子」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐお！　てるさんのか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gah! Teru-san's?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶん、みんなよってたかって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably, everyone will gather around and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利流を仕込むだろーから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: teach him the Mouri way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしくらいは、お袋がやったみたいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least someone like me, just like mother did,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつだけ……マトモなモン仕込もうかってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thought I'd teach him just one decent thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、てるさんやちぬちゃんにも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Teru-san and Chinu-chan too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お袋さんが何か仕込んだんだったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mother taught them something, didn't she?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まー、娘と決まったわけじゃーないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it's not decided that it's a daughter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お袋の考えが二代目で消えて無くなるのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but for mother's ideas to disappear with the second generation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとアレだしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that would be a bit of a shame.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも、赤ん坊のうちは食いモンに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, for infants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気ィつけなきゃなんねーしな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have to be careful about food...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平気で蜂蜜酒とか飲ませそうだし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They might just give them honey wine without a care...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいたい、戦場にぶち込むのは良いとして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Putting them on the battlefield is one thing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の世話、誰がやるんだ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but who will take care of everything else...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉貴、やれんのかよ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big sis, can you do it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………やたら気になってきた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I'm getting really worried...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたし、旅に出れっかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can I even go on a journey...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか、てるさんよりきくちゃんの方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Somehow, Kiku-chan seems more like the mother than Teru-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親みたいだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a mom...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バッ、やめやがれ、そーいうの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-You better stop saying things like that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……ふふんがふん……とくらぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haa... fufun ga fun... take this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大陸に来たってぇのに温泉とは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To come all the way to the continent and still find a hot spring...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、あったまるねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, this really warms me up...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくは日頃の疲労を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku was washing away her daily fatigue

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の温泉で流していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the hot spring of Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこに俺様どーーーーーーん！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And here I am—Ta-da!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶわあああぁぁぁッ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bwaaaah!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、きくちゃん発見。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, I found you, Kiku-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず良い身体をしているではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're still in such a great shape as always.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふふふ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gufufufu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てっ、てめぇっ、何を平然と女湯に……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-You damn it, what are you calmly doing in the women's bath...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （…………いや待て。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Wait a minute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもいつもこのパターンで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every single time with this pattern,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うろたえちまってるじゃねーか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I always get flustered, don't I?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この野郎にはそこをつけ込まれて何度も何度も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This bastard takes advantage of that again and again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたしも毛利の女！　同じ轍は踏まねぇ！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm also a Mouri woman! I won't make the same mistake!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく……年中発情中かよ、テメェ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seriously... are you horny all year round, you bastard?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくは背筋を伸ばし、平然とランスに向き直った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku straightened her back and calmly turned to face Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっち入って来ていい男はガキだけだぜ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only guys allowed to come in here are kids, you know?
